Params[3]: From the report of the retriever, I'm sure those residues are almost identical to the antigen.
Can't believe how fast it is for me to complete the mission, having traveled such a long way.
(Looks at the pinky bone in her hand) ...
I was going to take you away from this hell...
Please forgive me that this uninfected piece of you is all I can bring with me...
I'll bury you in a nice place.
(Puts the bone away) You take a good rest now...
(Looks up at the floating gold dust) But I'm still pissed...
...Comms isn't working, so I can't tell how it's going with Lucia and her group.
...Or she might have left already with her mission completed.
I can't beat Lucia if I'm happy with just completing my objective!
Now, I've already got a grasp on the engineering structure of the Golden Vortex...
If I can hand in a comprehensive engineering report, I'll surely put the technicians in Babylonia to shame.
I might even be able to speak at the Engineer Annual Conference...
I'll send an invitation to Lucia then for sure!
Then it's decided! I'll continue exploring the Golden Vortex!
